extendedInfo.description: Can't you find app for download music?   It's not problem, use the Fast Mp3 Downloader!  Search and download songs for free!1. Download million free mp3 songs from around World.2. You can listen and download to any song you want. What it is does is quite simple, it searches for songs in mp3 format in various popular file sharing servers, if it finds any then it will return the result.3. You can search all of your favourite musics, from old blues or classic songs to today's pop, rap, hiphop songs.4. Or simply download mp3 and the latest songs and music hits will catch your bones and make you dance!5. Easy to Use with Simple Interface. 6. Just type your favourite song title or artist. Download free mp3 songs. 7. You can find full length songs, and download full mp3 songs, collect mp3 on your device.8. The power of music is mind blowing, music can be an incredible tool for motivation!9. Music clears your mind and adjusts to positive thoughts.10. Your favorite mp3s in your Android!For comfortable listening of music is recommended to use Poweramp, WinAMP,PlayerPro Music Player, Android Music Player, n7player and HikiPlayerkeywords: download, audio, songs, downloader, mp3 file, music, easy, simple, pro, music mp3 Paradise, free, get music, mp3s, ringtones

reviews.title: It\'s good
reviews.comment: I Like it the only thing that sucks is all the music you download goes to a new playlist and you can\'t make them your ringtones and when you listen to the music on your playlist you can\'t get out of your playlist and the music still play it will shut off so if you wanna listen you got to stay on there which sucks cause I like to wonder on my phone when I listen to my music but it\'s a good app and I have found close to all my songs I\'ve wanted that I couldn\'t fine on my other music app

reviews.title: Adware and permissions
reviews.comment: I can find most any song I\'m looking for and dl it but the push notifications are ridiculous and uses a lot of data as it constantly runs in the foreground. It also asks for a lot more permissions than most apps. It accesses basically everything on your device. I\'m sure as with most mp3 downloaders this will eventually become obsolete and I\'ll have to uninstall since it\'s obvious piracy and find the newest available app for music.
